title: Famous "Animal House "College" shirt font
content:
What's the font on the famous "College" shirt from Animal House?

There a lot of fonts that look simular but I haven't found the exact font.

Looks like an iron-on font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015943im_/http:/typophile.com/files/collage_4649.jpg)
author: fontog

comments.content: There are tons of these college style faces and not all of them were digitized, so it's possible this one isn't available as a digital font.
